meetups.form.title: Are you a meetup organizer?
meetups.form.description: Want to integrate your meetup into Peach to enable cash trades? Fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
mailing.list.title: Subscribe to our mailing list to stay updated on Peach updates and receive P2P market statistics directly in your inbox!
mailing.list.optin: I agree to receive emails from Peach and accept the terms stated in the
mailing.list.unsubscribe: You can unsubscribe at any time via one of our email messages.

meta.description: Peach Bitcoin is your mobile solution for secure and anonymous Bitcoin transactions. Buy Bitcoin with gift cards, no verification. Trade peer-to-peer for total privacy. Discover how to buy and sell Bitcoin without KYC. Manage your digital assets anonymously on our non-KYC exchange platform.
meta.twitterDescription: Peach Bitcoin - Buy Bitcoin with gift cards, no verification. Trade peer-to-peer for anonymous transactions. Discover how to buy and sell Bitcoin privately and without KYC. Securely manage your Bitcoin with our non-KYC platform.
meta.ogTitle: Peach Bitcoin Exchange - Buy and sell Bitcoin anonymously and without KYC
meta.ogDescription: Peach Bitcoin - Buy Bitcoin with gift cards, no verification. Trade peer-to-peer for anonymous transactions. Discover how to buy and sell Bitcoin privately and without KYC. Securely manage your Bitcoin with our non-KYC platform.
home.teaser.title: Trade Bitcoin Without KYC
home.downloadPeach.title: Download Peach Bitcoin
home.downloadPeach.subtitle1: The Peach Bitcoin app is available for Android on Google Play Store; and Apple Testflight for IOS.
home.downloadPeach.subtitle2: You can also download Peach from Zapstore or download and install the APK directly.
home.features.registeredCompany: Peach is a registered Swiss company
home.features.licensedProvider: Peach is also a licensed Financial Service Provider
home.topSection.title: The Easiest Way to Buy & Sell Bitcoin Peer-to-Peer
home.topSection.subtitle: Peach Bitcoin is a peer-to-peer mobile app for trading Bitcoin anonymously: we do not conduct any Personal Identification processes (No KYC - Know Your Customer). Peach Bitcoin simply connects buyers and sellers together in a secure and private way!
home.contact.title: Have Further Questions About Peach?
home.contact.subtitle: Head over to our knowledge center to acquaint yourself more with Peach.
home.sectionThree.title: Global & Local Payment Methods Available!
home.sectionThree.description.part1: Buying and selling peer-to-peer means that you use the payment methods of your choice to pay and get paid. The buyer sends the fiat money directly to the seller’s specified account. Peach does not hold any user’s money at any point in time. The Bitcoin(s) are locked in an escrow to ensure a safe transaction for both parties.
home.sectionThree.description.part2: Whether you're looking to buy Bitcoin with a gift card or prefer the simplicity of purchase without ID, Peach provides a trusted platform for conducting anonymous transactions and peer-to-peer exchanges.
home.carousel.title: Start Buying & Selling Bitcoin In a Few Steps
home.carousel.step1.title: Download the Peach Bitcoin App.
home.carousel.step1.text: No registration, No verification! You're already set with a Bitcoin wallet that you self-custody.
home.carousel.step2.title: Setup Your Preferred Payment Methods
home.carousel.step2.text: Choose all the currencies and payment methods that you accept, even cash.
home.carousel.step3.title: Create An Offer
home.carousel.step3.text: Whether you’re buying or selling, create the corresponding offer and get matched to a peer to complete your trade.
home.connect.title: Connect With Peach
home.connect.mainChannelsText: New app releases, daily posts on X and Nostr.
home.connect.joinCommunitiesText: Ask all your questions, share all your feedback on Telegram and Discord.
home.connect.followYoutubeText: Lots of tutorials to learn the best tips on Peach.
home.newsletter.title: Subscribe to our mailing list for Peach updates and Peer-to-Peer market statistics.
home.newsletter.text: You can unsubscribe at any time, via any of our email messages.
home.testimonial.title: What Do People Say About Peach?
home.testimonial.rating: Rated 4.5/5.0 based on 91 Reviews. Showing our top reviews.
home.testimonial.reviewText: Peach is excellent, I have made two transactions and everything has been correct. It is secure and discreet, without KYC and has a seed phrase for wallet security.
home.testimonial.ctaText.part2: Leave us a review in Apollo, following this link and you'll earn a 500 sats reward!
home.getPeach.title: Get The Peach App Now
sroMember: Peach is an SRO member (Self Regulatory Organisation) of Polyreg
licensedProvider: Peach is a Swiss licensed financial service provider and is fully compliant with Switzerland’s Anti-Money Laundering Act.
